p: Comparison of HFRS caused by PUUV or DOBV in our patient sample found that the proportions of patients with headache and myalgia were higher in those infected with PUUV, whereas the proportions of patients with ascites, pleural effusion, bleeding, oliguria/anuria, and those who needed dialysis were higher in the group infected with DOBV ( S2 Fig). However, not all the differences were statistically significant ( Table 2).
